skyproc

Class NIF

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyproc.NIF

  • public class NIF
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that parses and represents a NIF object. Can be queried for its contents. NOTE: This is a rough/incomplete object. Expect deficiencies.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NIF.Node
      A single Node and its data in the nif file.
      static class  NIF.NodeType 
      static class  NIF.TextureSet
      Represents a set of textures on a node of a nif file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NIF

        public NIF(java.io.File f)
    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
           java.io.IOException,
           BadParameter
        Loads in a nif file from the specified file. Exceptions can be thrown if the file specified is not a nif file, or malformed.
        Parameters:
        f - File/path to load nif from.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        BadParameter - If the nif file is malformed (by SkyProc's standards)

      • NIF

        public NIF(java.lang.String filename,
   lev.LShrinkArray in)
    throws BadParameter
        Creates a NIF object from the given ShrinkArray. Throws exceptions if the data is not a proper nif file.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name to give the NIF object.
        in - Nif data to parse and load into the NIF object.
        Throws:
        BadParameter - If the data given to parse is malformed (by SkyProc's standards)

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,NIF.Node> getNodes(NIF.NodeType type)
        Parameters:
        type - Type to retrieve.
        Returns:
        Map of all the Node objects matching the given type, with their node index as keys.

      • getNiTriShapePackages

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<NIF.Node>> getNiTriShapePackages()
        A special function that returns sets of nodes each relating to a NiTriShape package. This return a list of lists containing a NiTriShape and all the nodes following up until another NiTriShape is encountered, which will start another list.
        Returns:
        List of NiTriShape node sets.

      • extractTextures

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,lev.LPair<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>>> extractTextures()
        Returns:
        A map with node index numbers as key, and Pairs of Node Name + List of textures as value.

      • extractTextureSets

        Returns:

      • extractBSTextures

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> extractBSTextures(NIF.Node n)
        Parameters:
        n - Node to extract texture names from. Must be a valid BSShaderTextureSet node or the function will fail.
        Returns:
        List of the textures in the node.
